  • Method Details

    • handle

      public void handle(String target, org.eclipse.jetty.server.Request baseRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException, javax.servlet.ServletException
      Method to handle the processing of a commit. Behaves according to the following steps: - Gets a request from GitHub for each commit via Webhook - Clones, builds and tests the commit - Updates the status of the commit on GitHub via API - Stores commit data for the front end deployment For more information, see https://www.eclipse.org/jetty/javadoc/jetty-9/org/eclipse/jetty/server/Handler.html
      Parameters:
      target -
      baseRequest -
      request -
      response -
      Throws:
      IOException
      javax.servlet.ServletException

    • updateCommitStatusOnGithub

      public static boolean updateCommitStatusOnGithub(String commitSHA, boolean success)
      Updates the status of the commit on GitHub Creates a request with information on the commit and sends it to GitHub API.
      Parameters:
      commitSHA - id of the commit
      success - status of the commit
      Returns:
      true if success, false if fail because the token for GitHub API is missing

    • main
